sentences.en: ...a sensitive piece of equipment used to detect radiation.
An observant doctor can often detect depression from expression, posture, and movement.
sentences.cn: 善于观察的医生常常能从人的表情、姿势以及动作诊察出抑郁症。

sentences.en: Arnold could detect a certain sadness in the old man's face.
sentences.cn: 阿诺德能觉察到老人脸上的一丝悲伤。

sentences.en: He conjectured that some individuals may be able to detect major calamities.
sentences.cn: 他猜测说有些人也许能够察觉重大灾难。

sentences.en: I can detect signs of improvement in your thinking.
sentences.cn: 我可以察觉出你思考问题方面的进步.

sentences.en: I could detect no triumph in his eye.
sentences.cn: 我不能在他的眼里看出胜利的喜悦.

sentences.en: I detect an undercurrent of resentment towards the new proposals.
sentences.cn: 我察觉到对新提案有一股潜在的不满情绪。

sentences.en: It is the business of the police to prevent and detect crime and of the law courts to punish crime.
sentences.cn: 防止及侦察犯罪是警察的职务而惩罚犯罪是法庭的职责.

sentences.en: Many forms of cancer can be cured if detected early.
sentences.cn: 如果发现得早，许多种癌症都可以治愈。

sentences.en: Radar is used to detect objects in the air or at sea.
sentences.cn: 雷达被用来探测空中或海上的目标.

sentences.en: The new test should enable doctors to detect the disease early.
sentences.cn: 新的检测手段应该能够使医生们尽早查出这种疾病。

sentences.en: The probe is sensitive enough to detect the presence of a single microbe.
sentences.cn: 这个探针的灵敏度很高,足以测出任何微生物的存在.

sentences.en: The tests are designed to detect the disease early.
sentences.cn: 这些检查旨在早期查出疾病。

sentences.en: Their instruments can detect the slightest vibration.
sentences.cn: 他们的仪器能探测出极微弱的震动.

sentences.en: They would be able to detect him from this printed description.
sentences.cn: 他们能根据报上所说的外貌特征把他认出来.

sentences.en: To detect shorter wavelengths, astronomers must put instruments above the earth's atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 要探测到更短的波长, 天文学家们就必须把仪器送到地球大气层以外去.

sentences.en: We are trying to detect and understand how the climates change.
sentences.cn: 我们正努力探寻并理解气候是如何变化的。

words.tran_cn: 侦查，探测；发觉，发现；察觉

trans.tran_en: to notice or discover something, especially something that is not easy to see, hear etc
